  • Method Details

    • createItem

      void createItem​(java.util.List<MenuItem> components, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new menu item based on the list of ingredients provided as a parameter
      Parameters:
      components - Ingredients of menu item
      name - Name of menu item

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem​(java.lang.String name)
      Deletes an item from the given menu
      Parameters:
      name - The item that will be deleted

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem​(java.util.List<MenuItem> components, java.lang.String name)
      Searches for the given product name as a parameter and adds base products to it
      Parameters:
      components - New base products an item contains
      name - Name of the product to be edited

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem​(MenuItem component, MenuItem newComponent)
      Searches for all the products that contain the given component and changes their details
      Parameters:
      component - components that needs to be edited

    • createNewOrder

      void createNewOrder​(java.lang.Integer table, java.util.List<MenuItem> menu)
      Creates a new order with the next ID, current date and its respective table
      Parameters:
      table - The table to which the order is assigned

    • computePrice

      java.lang.Double computePrice​(Order order)
      Calculates the price for the given order if it exists
      Parameters:
      order - Order whose price must be calculated
      Returns:
      The price

    • generateBill

      void generateBill​(Order order)
      Generates bill for the given order
      Parameters:
      order - Given order for the bill
